definition: phonetic fei or fi/elegant/phi (Greek letter Φ, φ)

sentences.english: The remarkable achievements of Chinese economy are admirable.
sentences.chinese: 中国经济发展成绩斐然，令人钦佩。

sentences.english: We have just concluded an enormously productive day.
sentences.chinese: 我们刚刚结束了成就斐然的一天。

sentences.english: She's a hotshot broker on Wall Street.
sentences.chinese: 她是华尔街一名业绩斐然的经纪人。

sentences.english: Their reforms have produced strong results.
sentences.chinese: 经济改革的效果也很斐然。

sentences.english: Erato is designed by HWang Feirang from Mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 是来自中国内地的参赛者黄斐然的作品。

sentences.english: My teaching get well success and every student develop very well after graduation.
sentences.chinese: 教学成绩斐然，学生后续发展良好。

sentences.english: Focus on the heart, Zen strikings.
In times past the elephants were more successful than people.
sentences.chinese: 昔日，在这片乐土上大象可要比我们人类成就斐然。

sentences.english: Even if the cram schools are successful, there are still problems.
sentences.chinese: 即使这些补习班的事业斐然，仍然存在著一些问题。

sentences.english: Very popular with the students, therefore, teaching achievement strikings.
sentences.chinese: 非常受学生欢迎，所以，教学成果斐然。

sentences.english: Therefore, even in writing a memorial, the ancients tried to make it rich and bright.
sentences.chinese: 因而即便是写奏折，古人也尽可能地写得文采斐然。

sentences.english: The joint efforts of different departments to sweep illegal porno publications have achieved great success.
sentences.chinese: 各部门联合展开的扫黄打非活动成绩斐然。

sentences.english: The years of 2004 and 2005 mark the fruitful studies of the educational thoughts of Yan Yuan.
sentences.chinese: 近几年，颜元教育思想的研究成绩斐然。

sentences.english: There were numerous schools and masters as well as works, being of great variety and achievement.
sentences.chinese: 清代荀学学派林立，大师辈出，著述繁富，成就斐然。

sentences.english: Fred Smith, and I understand that Federal Express is fairly substantial in China now as well.
sentences.chinese: 我知道联邦快递在中国也业绩斐然。

sentences.english: Since the construction of public security information, our country has achieved fruitful results.
sentences.chinese: 我国进行公安信息化建设以来，成绩斐然。

definition: worthy of pride/impressive/enviable/to show contempt for others
out of the ordinary/out of the common run
out of the ordinary/unusually (good, talented etc)
lit. not a common chord (idiom); outstanding/brilliant/out of the common run
victory reports pour in (idiom); news of success in an endless stream
to advance by leaps and bounds
lit. to have no time for civilities (idiom)/fig. not to be outdone/not to yield to one's opponents
